headline: Sibi Welcomes Marcus Ridgway to Board of Directors, Leading Innovation in Real Estate and Supply Chains
summary: Sibi, the platform redefining supply chain technology, is proud to announce the addition of Marcus Ridgway to its Board of Directors. Known for reshaping real estate investment through his current initiatives at Forever 6 and BLVD Homes, Ridgway's visionary approach to optimizing operations aligns with Sibi's commitment to streamlining procurement and asset management.
